description:

We’re here to talk about video game news!

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
Our Outer Worlds Re-Review is the GAMESCAST after today’s KFGD

Then Nick’s Streaming More DOOM

The Roper Report   -

GOOD NEWS: owners can finally upload and auto-upload screenshots and videos, Chris Scullion @ VGC
BAD NEWS: Check your Nintendo Switch 2 pre-order ASAP, as some retailers are reportedly cancelling them - Dashiell Wood @ Tech Radar
